'''''Vinyar Tengwar 30''''' is the thirtieth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|29|31}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "The Tower of Íth" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Words and Devices: Stone Towers" (column) — Carl F. Hostetter and Patrick H. Wynne
* "Transitions in Translations: The Neekerbreeker Says, 'Koube, Sase'" (column) — Arden R. Smith
